name: NoteSkin Selector
description:
A Remastered of NoteSkin Selector!

One of my old shitty scripts. This new and improve script allows you to select your note/splash skins in an easy and fast way.

And heavily improves the current built-in noteskin system in the engine, because that one sucks ass. It can also be used for making note packs easily.

Version: 2.0.0
